title: Notifier is a dedicated microservice designed to receive events from multiple sources (IoT devices, SaaS webhooks, partner systems, publishers) and provide a unified notification system. Its responsibilities include:

i.c: Notifier is a dedicated microservice designed to receive events from multiple sources (IoT devices, SaaS webhooks, partner systems, publishers) and provide a unified notification system. Its responsibilities include:

title: Normalizing incoming events into a canonical schema.

i.c: Normalizing incoming events into a canonical schema.

title: Routing and dispatching notifications to multiple channels (in-app, email, SMS, push, webhooks).

i.c: Routing and dispatching notifications to multiple channels (in-app, email, SMS, push, webhooks).

title: Supporting public and private publisher channels.

i.c: Supporting public and private publisher channels.

title: Enabling publishers to request optional subscriber profile attributes (with explicit consent).

i.c: Enabling publishers to request optional subscriber profile attributes (with explicit consent).

title: Ensuring reliability, idempotency, and observability of notifications.

i.c: Ensuring reliability, idempotency, and observability of notifications.

title: Publishers
b
: legal entities who emit events. They must register and maintain a paid subscription to use the platform.

i.c: : legal entities who emit events. They must register and maintain a paid subscription to use the platform.

title: Listeners
b
: individuals who subscribe to publishers channels. They decide what publishers to follow and what profile information to disclose.

i.c: : individuals who subscribe to publishers channels. They decide what publishers to follow and what profile information to disclose.

title: Message broker / Queue
b
: decouples publishers from subscribers, enabling asynchronous, scalable, and reliable delivery.

i.c: : decouples publishers from subscribers, enabling asynchronous, scalable, and reliable delivery.

title: Containerization
b
: Docker (multi-service: Notifier, queue workers, broker, MySQL)

i.c: : Docker (multi-service: Notifier, queue workers, broker, MySQL)

title: Real-time updates
b
: WebSockets or Server-Sent Events for React clients

i.c: : WebSockets or Server-Sent Events for React clients
